revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Libre Computer |model=AML-S905X-CC |revision=(Le Potato) |asin=B074P6BNGZ |price=35 |est_release_date=June 2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905X |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |fla1=0 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63CFR-RDC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, eMMC module connector, |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3-VRMS Audio Line Driver;3Peak IC;TPF632A;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;Maxim Integrated;MAX809R;;1;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;4;,,, Ultra low dropout, 500mA, CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;2; |flags=HDMI 2.0, I2C, SPI, GPIO, SPDIF, IR receiver, ADC header, CVBS header, Micro SD Card slot, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2018.04; |stock_os=Linux;4.14.55;Ubuntu 18.04; |tp_firmware=Android 7.1, Armbian, Debian, LibreELEC, |oui_eth=18:66:C7 }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://libre.computer/products/boards/aml-s905x-cc/ Product page] ''"Libre Computer Board
AML-S905X-CC-V1.0-A"'' is silkscreened on the board near the 40-pin GPIO connector. {{see also|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}} *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libre_Computer_Project#AML-S905X-CC_(Le_Potato) ''AML-S905X-CC (Le Potato)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/librecomputer/libre-computer-board-next-gen-4k-sbc-dev-board-for ''AML-S905X-CC Le Potato: Fastest 4K SBC under $50 for Makers'' on '''Kickstarter'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/06/30/libre-computers-le-potato-amlogic-s905x-development-board-goes-for-25-and-up-crowdfunding/ ''Libre Computer Le Potato Amlogic S905X Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/07/17/le-potato-development-board-review-part-1-hardware-and-accessories/ ''Le Potato Board Review – Part 1: Hardware and Accessories'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905X (Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz *GPU: ''Mali-450'' @750MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM • SK hynix *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot, eMMC module socket *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 4x USB 2.0 ports ===Models=== *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1GB/2GB • [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1GB/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Tritium (2GB)]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 512MB/1GB/2GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] ====ALL-H3-CC (Tritium)==== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" style="text-align:center;" ! Variant !! ALL-H3-CC H2+ (512MB) !! ALL-H3-CC H3 (1GB) !! ALL-H3-CC H5 (2GB) |- ! CPU | [[Allwinner]] H2+
(4x ARM Cortex-A7) || [[Allwinner]] H3
(4x ARM Cortex-A7) || [[Allwinner]] H5
(4x ARM Cortex-A53) |- ! GPU | 1G + 2P ARM Mali-400
OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1 | 1G + 2P ARM Mali-400
OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1 | 2G + 4P ARM Mali-450
OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1 |- ! VPU | colspan=3 | [[Allwinner]] Display Engine 2.0 • Encoders: H.264 (1080p30)
• Decoders: VP8 (1080p60), H.265/H.264 (4k30/1080p60), JPEG/MJPEG (1080p30) |- ! Storage | colspan=3 | MicroSD Card Slot, eMMC 4.x Interface |- ! colspan=1 | RAM | 512MB (DDR3-1600) || 1GB (DDR3-1600) || 2GB (DDR3-1600) |- ! USB | colspan=3 | 4x USB 2.0 Type A |- ! colspan=1 | Network | colspan=3 | 100Mbps (Fast Ethernet) |- ! colspan=1 | Video Out | colspan=2 | HDMI 1.4 (1080p) HDCP 1.2,
3.5mm TRRS AV Jack | colspan=1 | HDMI 1.4 (4k30) HDCP 1.2,
3.5mm TRRS AV Jack |- ! colspan=1 | Other | colspan=3 | IR Receiver, U-Boot Button, UART header, 40-pin header (PWM, I2C, SPI, GPIO) |- |} __NOTOC__
